mapper.sql: id, company_id, partner_company_id, process_name, description, frame_process_code, flag_avaliable, flag_deleted, flag_tested, create_person, create_time, update_person, update_time, avaliable_time
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into wp_cfg_frame_process
id,
company_id,
partner_company_id,
process_name,
description,
frame_process_code,
flag_avaliable,
flag_deleted,
flag_tested,

create_time,

update_time,

#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{partnerCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update wp_cfg_frame_process
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
partner_company_id = #{partnerCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
process_name = #{processName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
frame_process_code = #{frameProcessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag_avaliable = #{flagAvaliable,jdbcType=BIT},
flag_deleted = #{flagDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
flag_tested = #{flagTested,jdbcType=BIT},
create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_person = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
avaliable_time = #{avaliableTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select frame.id, frame.partner_company_id partnerCompanyId, frame.process_name processName, frame.description, frame.frame_process_code frameProcessCode, fv.update_time updateTime, fv.flag_avaliable flagAvailable, fv.id versionId, company.company_name partnerCompanyName from wp_cfg_frame_process frame left join wp_cfg_frame_process_version fv on fv.cfg_frame_process_id=frame.id left join dmi_company_info company on company.id=frame.partner_company_id where frame.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and frame.flag_deleted=0 and frame.flag_avaliable=1 and fv.flag_is_last=1

SELECT frame.id,company.company_name companyName, frame.process_name processName,version.company_active_time companyActiveTime
,1 flagType
,0 flagType
FROM wp_cfg_frame_process frame LEFT JOIN dmi_company_info company
ON frame.partner_company_id=company.id
ON frame.company_id=company.id
LEFT JOIN wp_cfg_frame_process_version version ON version.cfg_frame_process_id=frame.id WHERE frame.flag_deleted=0 AND company.flag_deleted=0 AND version.flag_avaliable=1 AND version.flag_is_last
AND frame.partner_company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND frame.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
